Detailed Description

The Oyun wizard class.

This wizard creates the various wizard pages and adds them to the main window. For the moment, the wizard has the Game object as well.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

OyunWizard::OyunWizard ( )

Default constructor.

The default constructor is to be used for two-step creation with the Create() function.

OyunWizard::OyunWizard ( wxWindow *  parent)

Constructor.

Parameters:
parentThe parent window, may be NULL

Member Function Documentation

void OyunWizard::AddPlayer ( Player *  player)

Send a new-player message to all pages.

This function constructs a wxEVT_ADD_PLAYER event and sends it to all of the wizard pages. As soon as the function returns, the player passed to this function can be deleted.

Parameters:
playerPlayer of the type to be added to all pages
bool OyunWizard::Create ( wxWindow *  parent)

Create the dialog.

Only call this function if the wizard was constructed with its default constructor.

Parameters:
parentThe parent window, may be NULL
Returns:
True if successfully created, false otherwise
bool OyunWizard::OnFileDrop ( const wxArrayString &  files)

Handle drag-and-dropped files.

This function will add an FSA player to the player list, if the players page is currently visible.

Parameters:
filesArray of filenames dropped
Returns:
True if the drop was successful, false otherwise
void OyunWizard::OnFinished ( wxWizardEvent &  event) [private]

Called when the wizard finishes.

Parameters:
eventThe event generated
void OyunWizard::RemovePlayer ( Player *  player)

Send a remove-player message to all pages.

This function constructs a wxEVT_REMOVE_PLAYER event and sends it to all of the wizard pages. As soon as the function returns, the player passed to this function can be deleted. The pages will delete any players which are of the same type, name, and author as the player parameter.

Parameters:
playerPlayer like that to be removed
void OyunWizard::Update ( )

Send a data-update message to all pages.

This function constructs a wxEVT_DATA_UPDATE event and sends it to all of the wizard pages.
